data.description:
Fight Mouse Battle is an exciting virtual reality (VR) shooting game where players face a dangerous enemy army. The player's mission is to eliminate all enemies within a time limit and achieve the highest possible score.

Game Features:

Immersive VR Environment: Players will immerse themselves in a virtual world with stunning graphics and detailed environments. The realistic sensation of movement, looking around, and shooting will create a vivid and engaging experience.
Diverse Weapon System: Players have access to a range of powerful weapons to choose from, including automatic rifles, handguns, sniper rifles, grenades, and bombs. Each weapon has different firepower and range, allowing players to customize their tactics.
Intelligent Enemies: The enemies in the game are programmed with smart behavior and quick reactions. They will attack the player from various directions and try to dodge bullets. This requires players to have quick reflexes and flexible strategies to emerge victorious.
Time Limit: Players have a limited time to complete each level. The challenge is to eliminate all enemies in the shortest time possible to achieve a high score and climb the leaderboard.
Scoring System and Leaderboard: Each enemy elimination rewards players with corresponding points. The high scores are recorded and displayed on the leaderboard, encouraging players to compete for the top position.
